title: Justin Bieber and wife Hailey have huge wedding photo delivered to their LA mansion

Justin Bieber and his wife Hailey pulled out all the stops as they had their famous wedding photo delivered to their Beverly Hills mansion.

The newly-married couple received a blown up version of the lavish black and white photo they shared on Instagram earlier this month.

The striking picture was taken in a photobooth on their big day, as Justin and Hailey showed off an estimated $750,000 worth of diamonds.

Model Hailey, 22, matched her $500,000 engagement ring with a diamond wave shaped band, which is believed to be from Tiffany & Co.

She was also spotted wearing a pair of stunning earrings from the designer brand that were over five carats and worth over $123,000, as Justin donned his Israeli diamond $25,000 grillz.

(Image: Vasquez-Max Lopes / BACKGRID)

Wednesday's special delivery comes as Justin's sweetheart ex Selena Gomez seemingly criticised the star for tying the knot so quickly with his new wife Hailey in her new song Lose You To Love Me.

The songstress threw some major shade at her ex Justin Bieber .

Social media was awash with fans convinced Selena was singing about Justin in her scathing lyrics.

(Image: Getty Images)

In a blistering take down, the pop princess sung about "being replaced in two months".

Selena and Justin go way back as they romanced from 2009 until 2017; they later reunited after she dated The Weeknd for a brief time.

However, the long-time lovers called it quits in March and by July Justin was engaged to his other ex Hailey.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Justin and Hailey were married in the September of that year and they got married for a second time in recent months.

The lyrics read: "I gave my all and they all know it / You turned me down, and now it’s showing / In two months you replaced us / Like it was easy / Made me think I deserved it."

Another chorus added: "Cause it wasn’t yours / You promised the world / Made her more of a woman / I needed to lose you to find me."

Fans put the feelers out on social media as they claimed Selena was responding to her ex's marriage to Hailey.

"Justin hiding from Hailey to listen to Selena’s new song #LoseYouToLoveMe."

"If Selena wants to write about Justin Bieber, LET HER. She can heal however she needs to and wants to. Everyone deals with their own pain in different ways. Goodbye. #LoseYouToLoveMe."
description: Their huge wedding photo was delivered as ex Selena Gomez realed a heartbreak song about Justin
